reviewText: Los nombres de las películas  aparecen en la fotografía de la portada. Son "Enamorada", "Flor de Mayo" y Río Escondido". Esta última intenté encontrarla por todos lados en México y ya no la encontré. Es una joya de película.

This seems like a DVD with three Mara Flix films but the description does not provide the titles so it's impossible to know what the hell you are buying.  The graphic included is so small you can't read what it says. Obviously you are better off running away from this lousy product.
